responses: A computer is an electronic device which takes information in digital form and performs a series of operations based on predetermined instructions to give some output.
Charles Babbage, an English mechanical engineer and polymath, originated the concept of a programmable computer.
The first substantial computer was the giant ENIAC machine by John W. Mauchly and J. Presper Eckert at the University of Pennsylvania.

patterns: What is full form of ENIAC

responses: A microprocessor is an electronic component that is used by a computer to do its work
An operating system (OS) is system software that manages computer hardware, software resources, and provides common services for computer programs.

A supercomputer is a computer with a high level of performance as compared to a general-purpose computer.
A supercomputer is a computer with great speed and memory.
